lexUnit.name: nape.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the back of a person's neck. NB: not always used of people

sentence.text: He went across and stroked the nape of her neck , and she sniffed and stiffened and then relaxed .
Now the sun stroked Jasper 's back , laid a burning hand on the nape of his neck .
Into the nape of the neck of the youngest , who was lying on his stomach with part of his spine exposed , the flesh and muscle ripped away by the 9mm bullet .
The nape of her neck began to prickle .
I can see the nape of her neck go red .
Charsky stroked her shoulder , kissed her nape .
He lay quiet , his eyes closed , and she stroked his nape .
Her nape was bare for kissing all day long .
His hand was still massaging her nape and all the fear and tension seemed to be draining away , leaving her drowsy .
` And did n't we all know you for a darling girl ? " he whispered in her ear as his fingers continued to blaze fire across her exposed nape .
No need for a hat , but the hair must be pulled off the face to minimise distraction and caught at the nape in a black band into which she would stick a single green feather .
He stood behind her , his hands falling to her nape like someone about to fix the clasp of a necklace .
From Black-headed Gull differs in summer by black hood extending over nape on to upper neck , in winter by blackish bill and at all times by smoky grey underwing and no black on wing-tips .
His fine , dark hair was drawn back tightly from his forehead , secured at the nape in a tiny porcelain bowl of purest white .
` Long hair will be dressed , with soft chignons into the nape as well as on top .
Her hair had been cut shorter than usual round her neck , accentuating the elegant curve of the nape and softening the slight masculinity of her features .
Ducks and immatures , known as ` red-heads : have chestnut head and nape , with white chin .
Immature , with grey nape and black-tipped tail , lacks diagonal dark wing-bar of immature Kittiwake and Little Gull .
She had a bun of hair at her nape from which stuck out carved hairpins , thinner than split matchsticks .
The unusually deep , bass voice was amused , making the hair on Caroline 's nape rise , and her heart lurch .
He was stroking her hair , the nape of her neck , rhythmically caressing her bare shoulders , tracing the slim length of her upper arms .
The hairs on the nape of my neck tingled and my tired heart lurched with fear .
